The predicted stock trends (up and down) are denoted by up-pointing triangles and down-pointing triangles. The prediction model was built by calling Decision Tree C4.5 algorithm in SAP Hana PAL. Independent vairables used in this model are STOCK_CHANGE DOUBLE, DOCUMENT_TOTAL_COUNT INTEGER, SENTIMENT_TOTAL_COUNT INTEGER, POSITIVE_PERCENT DOUBLE, NEUTRAL_PERCENT DOUBLE, NEGATIVE_PERCENT DOUBLE, CALENDAR_EVENT_COUNT INTEGER, and STOCK_TREND.

NOTE: the stock close price presented by the Y locations in this plot are NOT a result of prediction
